channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Woman killed in suspected mountain lion attack while hiking in northern Colorado
item.description: A woman was killed in a suspected mountain lion attack while she was hiking alone in the mountains of northern Colorado

item.title: Trump wants to overhaul the 'president's golf course.' He hasn't played there yet
item.description: Presidents often find solace in golfing, and Joint Base Andrews in Maryland is a favorite spot because it's close to the White House and has built-in ...

item.title: Rhode Island firefighters rescue a yellow Lab from an icy pond on New Year's Day
item.description: Firefighters in Rhode Island rescued a yellow Labrador named Phoenix on New Year's Day after he fell through an ice-covered pond

item.title: Indiana beats Alabama 38-3 in the Rose Bowl to advance to the College Football Playoff semifinals
item.description: Indiana beats Alabama 38-3 in the Rose Bowl to advance to the College Football Playoff semifinals
